attributes.additional_details: Many young children has got anxiety kr depression just because of school
attributes.background: Its harder to learn in person as somone who has social anxiety and its not the best way to learn right now as covid cases rise

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/603955

We have also published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Create a national online school for pupils unable to attend school premises: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607052
